choices: Find a mirror to examine the mark.
Ignore the mark, and find a med nin for info
Find Hinata to check on her.
1.content: Shino wakes up in medical, seemingly fine. He asks his Insects for a check of his body and their status. They report nothing seems out of the ordinary, Except for a small mark on his neck. Getting up...
1.title: Wking up.

choices: Finds them no where in sight.
11.content: Grabbing a hand mirror sitting on the table next tot he bed. Shino examine the mark on his neck. It's a solid black mark, much like the one Sasuke use to have. Knowing what the mark did to Sasuke it would be wise to seal it. Putting the mirror down Shino climbs up out of bed. Reaching for his jacket and hooded coat....
11.title: Find a mirror to examine the mark.

info.brief_description: Shino's cursed with a Tsunada making mark! What will happen?
info.description:
During a mission after Orichimaru, Shino has a curse mark placed on him. It was ment to be used on Hinata to make another Tsunada to actas Orichimarus new medic. However do to Shino diving in at the last moment, Now Shino bears the curse mark.

Rules:

1. Please try to keep the entree's atleast 4 sentences long.
2. Try to spell as accurately as possible.
3. Any pairings you wish. I'm not against any of them.
4. Follow the sites rules.
